div.p:
xxiijo die mensis maij Anno Domini et cetera lxxmo comparuit coram balliuis pro tribunali sedentibus Johannes
de marr' filius quondam Johannis de marr' vici furcarum et dedit Johannem mathouson' plegium quod summa octo
decem librarum recepta per ipsum a Johanne Waus' et quod ipse Johannes erit respondil' pro summa predicta cuicumque
legittime ad hoc placitum in futuris

Eodem die Johannes tailyour' vici furcarum adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione mariorie
hill' et emendabit parti lese prout Jura volunt

Willelmus de lyntone' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Roberti burnat et emendabit
parti lese prout Jura volunt

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem penultimo die mensis maij anno Domini
et cetera lxxmo quo die secte vocate et curia affirmata absentes patent inferius /

The samyn day gilbert leche our' comburges was made quyt be a sworne' assise of
the wrangwys' hewing of thome' fraseris wode for the quhilkis he folowyt him
in playn court befor' the aldirman and the bailyeis sittande in Jugement /

Gilbertus de skene' de eodem super quem gilbertus de Kintor porrexit plegium pro iniusta detencione
ab eodem de iiijxxx petras lanem ad bonum computum prout patet per suam obligacionem et dictus
gilbertus de skene' pecijt diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio et obligacione et balliui assig
narunt sibi diem veneris aduenientem quindecem dies proximo sequentes ad respondendum dicto plegio
et obligacione ad bonum computum et super hoc dedit cristinum litstar' plegium ad intrandum dictum
gilbertum ad diem prefixum

The samyn day Dauid hill' entirit gilbert of skene' befor' androw scherar' bailye as he that
come' borch' for' him and dischargeit him of the saide borowgang in tym to cum

The samyn day thomas fraser of the stanywode fande alexander gilbert of skene law borch'
for him and all his party that gilbert leche our' conburges sall be vnscathet of him and all his
party vthir wayis than the cours' of common law will' and alsua his seruandis and takis with
all

div.head: smytht /
div.p:
The achtande day of Junij the yer' of god et cetera lxx patrik smitht is in amerciament
of this court for' the wrangwys' strublance of maryone' vokat In richt disputous'
wordis sayande scho was a myssale woman and til amende it til hir' as law will'
and the saide marione' quyt of all strublans of the saide patrik smitht

Johannes stewart adiudicatur in amerciamento curie per confessionem propriam pro iniusta fractione communis
statuti huius burgi in propinacione birre pro quatuor denariis quartam eiusdem
Johannes de hill' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro eadem causa.
Johannes skynnar' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro eadem causa.
thomas gardenar' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro eadem causa

Jacobus parfite primus testis Juratus et examinatus in causa mota inter Dauid galichtly et Duncanum
robertson' de Kilbethok dicit in suo Juramento quod audiuit Johannem parfite dicentem quod dictus Duncanus compu
tauit cum dicto Johanne et plenarie satisfecit sibi de omnibus computis inter ipsos habitis sed non audiuit
aliquod verbum de frumento gilberti de camera

Andreas Watson' secundus testis Juratus et examinatus in eadem causa dicit in suo Juramento quod dictus Dun
canus finaliter computauit cum predicto Johanne parfite in ipsius presencia de omnibus computis et signanter
de frumento gilbertj de camera et de eisdem plenarie satisfecit /

Willelmus blindsele dedit themannum goldsmitht plegium legalem pro se et parte sua quod Willelmus
cadyow et pars sua tota de eisdem aliter quam per viam Juris

Willelmus cadyow dedit Johannem stewinson' filius plegium preposito ad intrandum ipsum coram ipso et consulibus
in die mercurie xiij die mensis Junij ad subeundum legem de lesione Willelmi blindsele et Insuper dictus
Willelmus cadyow dedit Johannem stewinson' patrem plegium legalem pro se et parte sua tota quod dictus
Willelmus blindsele erit indempnis et omnes sibi in hac parte adheren' aliter quam per viam Juris

The xxij day of the moneth of Junij the yer of god et cetera lxx yeris Androw fraser son' and air' to
thomas fraser of the stanywode with' his forspekar maystir thomas the hay parson' of crowdane
and maystir Johne' the hay made protestacione and opinly protestit that the deliuering of the pundis tane
be him of the tone' of Abirdene for the hewing of birkis of the stanywode agayn to the personys that he
tuk thaim fra at the commawnde of the serreff depute of abirdene turne him na his airis to na preiudice
til his interess' to the saide wod in tymes to cum / quhilk protestacione was made befor' the aldirman
and bailyeis syttande in Jugement in thair' pretor' and vthir' diuers' and sindry of the saide tovne'
Johannes coupar
Johannes de tulyyouch
Dauid de orde /

Eodem die patricius tailyour' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis de marr'
filij et emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt /

The ferde day of the moneth of Julij the yer' of god et cetera lxx yeris it is ordanyt be the aldirman
and a certan of the consaile that gif William young the baxtar accedis in worde or in deide in tym to cum
til androw baxtar and be conuickit thar' of he sal pay onforgiffin x markis til the kirk werk and
richt swa gif androw baxtar accedis Jh til Will young ony maner of avayis as forsaide is he sal pay to the
kirk werk x merkis on forgiffin to be raysit be the maystir of the kirk werke / and sa ferr'
William young has accedis to androw baxtar at this tym he sal pay to the haly bludis licht a
punde of wax / be caus' he is brothir' of the gilde

The assise has deliueryt and ordanyt gilbert of chawmer that come borche for fergus'
chapman to Dauid meignes for a certan some' of siluer to content and pay to the saide Dauid
meignes xlj s' and fre the saide fergus' of the saide Dauid meignes clayme in tym to cum

Andreas rede de badfothale deuenit plegius balliuis ad intrandum Johannem de marr' in crastino in
pretorio coram balliuis ad instanciam Willelmi quelp et ad respondendum eidem prout Jura volunt

Memorandum that quhar' fergus' chapman was chargit be Johne' the Waus' ane of the seriandis of
this burgh' at the commawnde of the aldirman and bailyeis to ramayn stil in the tolbuth' on
to the tym that he content and payit to Dauid meignes xlj s' of siluer acht til him he is passit
furth' of the tolbuth' but lefe of ony man and has made na contentacione to the saide Dauid of the
some' in lichtlying and contempnyng of the saide aldirman and bailyeis atour' thair' forbeding

Vndecimo die mensis Julij anno Domini et cetera lxxmo Matheus coupar pl palam fatebatur se debere gilberto
moryson' dimidiam barellam salmonum mensure hamburgensis et ad satisfaciendum eidem infra hinc et
festum sancti petri quod dicitur aduinculam sancti petri proximum sequens datam presentis scripti

The xx day of the moneth' of August the yer' of god et cetera lxx yeris comperit in Jugement
befor' the aldirman and bailyeis of the burgh' of aberdene syttande in Jugemet Jugement charlys factour' and
attornay til Johne' finkle' and Edwarde finkle' citenaris and draparis of london' and askyt
on the forsaide Johne' and Edwardis behalf fra Johne' Wormot four' hamburgh barellis of salmunde
and vj s' and four' pennice Inglis aucht to thaim be his obligacione as the saide charlys allegis
the quhilk salmunde and siluer the saide Johne' Wormot allegit that he hade payde it til thair'
factouris and offerit him to prefe it within lachfull tym and thar' eftir at the ordinans
of the aldirman bailyeis and diuers' of the counsale than beande present the saide Johne' Wormot chargit
the saide charlis til his saide maystiris that gife thai will swer' befor' ony aldirman of london'
that thai ar' nocht payit na nan of thair' factouris in thair' name bringande gud certyfi
cacione vndir that aldirmannis sele with a sufficiande acquitans of discharge the saide
Johne' Wormot is oblist to content and pay the forsaide iiijor barellis of salmunde and the vj
s' iiij d' Inglis to the bringar' of the saide certyficacione and the acquitans of discharge but
ony interrupcione or demawnde /

The samyn day it is deliueryt be ane sworne' assise that the hamburgh of salmunde and twa half
barellis of salmunde that fergus chapman laide in sandris Westlandez bot in bamf that
gilbert of chawmer sall hafe the hale hamburgh barell' of salmunde and that Johne' of Knollis
sal hafe the tahalf barell' and Wat blindsele The tothir' half barell' of salmunde thai
payande the fracht of thaim to sandris Westlande /

Memorandum that cristy litstar' grauntyt him awande til Johne' Wormot a hamburgh barell'
of salmunde full rede and swete to be deliueryt til him be mydsomer next to cum but
ony langar' delay .

The xiij day of the moneth of Julij the yer' of god et cetera lxx it is appoyntyt and fullely
accordit befor' the aldirman and the maste part of the consaile betuix gylbert leche on that a part
and Dauid farchar' on that vthir' part anent the lande of the saide Dauid farcharis that is to say
that the saide Dauid farchar' sal ramayn in the saide lande til Witsonday next to cum pay
ande to the saide gilbert for male of the saide lande xiij s' iiij d' and mar' atour' the sayde
Dauid sall fre the saide lande of al annuallis at Witsonday And gif the saide Dauid payis
and contentis xj li' xv s' to the saide gilbert be the fest of Witsonday next tocum he sall haf
his lande fre and giffis he payis him nocht the saide some' be the saide terme of Witsonday
the lande sal be frely deliueryt to the saide gilbert as vtirly bocht and saulde for the forsaide some'
but obstakle' or demawnde and the saide Dauid sal finde sickir' souerte to gilbert for the male and
annuall' freyng to be payit at lachfull termys betuix this and sonday and in meyne tym
the lande sal ramayn on spoilyeit of ony thing be ony of the forsaide parteis the saide Dauid
has fundin thome traile borche to the balyeis to fulfill the forsaide condicionis

div.head: Inquisicio
div.p:
Alexander blindsele Johannes scrogis matheus fechat thomas de camera Dauid simson' Johannes
de Kintor Robertus Wormot Dauid de Kintor Willelmus de Ratre Willelmus blindsele Dauid mathow
son et Johannes stewart qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam andreas galt frater Johannis galt latoris presencium
obijt vltimo vestitus et saysitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra cum pertinenciis
Jacente in vico inferiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram laurencij thomson' ex parte occidentali
et terram mathei de culan ex parte orientali et quod dictus Johannes galt est legittimus et propinquior
heres dicti quondam andree galt fratris sui de dicta terra cum pertinenciis et quod est legittime etatis

Curia legalis balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjto die mensis Julij anno Domini
et cetera lxxmo /

Eodem die Johannes moyses super quem Alexander blindsele porrexit plegium pro iniusta deten
cione ab eodem de xxxvj s' debitis sibi de restante vnius pipe rubei vini propinati in taberna Dauid
meignes et de iij libras et x s' sibi debitis de restante duorum doliorum vnius dolij vini quod propinauit in taberna
propria et emebat ab eodem sepe vocatus ad sectam dicti alexandri non comparuit tanquam primo die huius processus
et ideo precipitur seriando /

Eodem die henricus de culan porrexit plegium in manibus vnius seriandorum quod exquo Jacobus
craike non comparuit ad prosequendum plegium quod porrexit super eum fuit quitus de suo clameo
quousque fuerit de nouo summonitus /

Johannes de Knollis vnius balliuorum huius burgi pro tribunali sedens concessit et palam
fatebatur quod ipse cepit securos plegios de Johanne Wormot quod Johannes Waus' Junior et pars
sua tota erunt indempnes de se et parte sua tota aliter quam per viam Juris

Eodem die Dauid holle fatebatur se debere et satisfacere Johanni Wormot vnam barellam
salmonum mensure hamburgensis infra terminum Juris et dictus Johannes dabit dicto Dauid barellam
ad imponendum dictos salmones /

Robertus bennat adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta capcione vnius olle a domino thoma andirson'
capellano et ad restituendum dictam ollam dicto domino thome sine dilacione et conuictus fuit per assisam
de inobediencia facta philippo de Drumbrek seriando /

Robertus bennat dedit Willelmum blindsele plegium legalem quod ipse nuncquam de cetero faciet inobedienciam
alicui officiario huius burgi sub pena quinque marcarum soluend' ad communionem bursam sine remissione /

Marioria branche sponsa Willelmi lutar' super quam Andreas adamson' porrexit plegium pro iniusta
detencione ab eodem de nouem solidis et septem denariis sibi debitis pro brasio sepe vocata ad sectam
dicti andree non comparuit tanquam primo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera

Eodem die edwardus farcharson' dedit Willelmum blindsele plegium pro se ad intrandum coram balliuis
in crastino ad instanciam thome de fyfe in pretorio huius burgi

Willelmus de mernys et Willelmus clerk pistores adiudicantur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione
thome ymlach' in recepcione vnius libre de denario et emendabunt sibi prout Jura volunt et
de ceteris deliberatis per assisam stabunt Judicio prepositi et consilij /

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xxjo die mensis Julij
anno Domini et cetera lxxmo

Eodem die Johannes moyses super quem Alexander blindsele porrexit plegium pro iniusta deten
cione ab eodem vt supra sepe vocatus ad sectam dicti alexandri non comparuit tanquam secundo die huius
processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera

Item in actione mota inter robertum louson' et thomam moscrop penes solucionem xxx d' debitis
dicto thome quam summam dictus thomas assignauit vt dictus robertus asseruit Dauid findelayson' si dictus
Dauid velit Jurare quod ipse recuperet cepit dicto roberto de plena solucione dicte summe de onerando dictum tho
mam dictus robertus erit quitus de clameo dicti thome vel quod non cepit ad solucionem dicti robertj nisi de tanto
quanto sibi velit dare de summa predicta dictus robertus satisfaciet dicto thome quantum restat de dicta
summa non soluta prefato Dauid et hoc faciet dictus Dauid in die veneris proxima sequente sine vlteriori
dilacione /

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo quinto die mensis
Augusti anno Domini et cetera lxxmo quo die et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus sadlar' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie per confessionem propriam pro iniusta perturbacione
mariote sponse michaelis blaklug et emendabit eedem prout Jura volunt /

The x day of september the yer' of god et cetera lxx comperit berwarde clayis son' of bonny
befor the bailyeis syttande in Jugement and askyt at Alexander of chawmer thre obligacionis /
ane of richarde of Kyntoris ane of androw alansonys and ane of gilbert of Kyntoris the quhilkis
he deliueryt til him in keping on his awne behalfe and on nane vthiris behalfe to be de
lyuerit agayn to the saide berwarde

The samyn day the saide berwarde has deliueryt to Dauy colyson' ane obligacione of gilbert of
Kyntor for twa punde grettis acht til him be Dunwyss' of bonny and giffis the saide Dauy
full power' to folow and to ressaue the some' contenit in the saide obligacione to content him
of the twa punde g'

The samyn day alexander rolande tuk to pruff' lachfully on friday that next cummys the clamys
he clamyt thome Jamyson' that beande done' the saide thome sall content him his clamys and gif he
failyeis of his proffe at the saide day the saide thome sall acquyt him that he aw nocht and be quyt

Johne' barbour' is in amercyament of this curt sic as he aw to tyne of law for the wrangwis' strub
ling of sandy of hill and til amende til him as law will' /

Sandy hill' on the samyn wis' is in amercyament for the wrangwis' strubling of John barbour' and til
amende it til him as law will'

Cristy litstar' is oblist til Patrik besat to deliueryt to cop symundson' in his name a hamburgh barell'
of salmunde full rede and swete / in flandris at the our'cummyng of cop symundson' and failyeande
of the salmunde to deliuer to the saide cop symundson' alsmekle' flemys monee as the saide patrik
sell' ony of his awin salmunde and failyeande of bathe the saide cristy oblis' him to pay to the
saide patrik in scotlande alsmekle' scottis monee for the saide hamburgh barell' as the saide patrik
sell' his awin salmunde as ony merchande leuys' his punde g' hame / And gif the saide cristy
contentis and payis to the saide patrik the forsaide hamburgh barell' of salmunde as said is or the schippis
saile / he is quyt of al thingis befor writyn /

xjmo die mensis septembris anno Domini quo supra Willelmus quelp obligauit se coram balliuis
ad restituendum vnum annulum auri ricardo de culan infra quindenam proximam sequentem et extraxit
ad plegium terras et bona sua vniuersa

The xiij day of the moneth of september the yer' of god et cetera lxx yeris Johne' of
has fundin Duncane sanchar' of murcroft and thome of marr' his brothir' borowys for
him til ansuer' til a borch' strekyt apon' him of ane hundreth' pundis be Willam quelp as
law will' /

The samyn day the forsaide Johne' of marr' has made the saide Duncane of sanchar' and thom of marr' his lachfull
procuratur' til ansuer' for him coniunctly and seueraly in the saide actione movit be thom William
quelp et cetera

The xv day of september the yer' of god et cetera lxx comperit Dauy meignes in Jugement befor the aldirman
and askyt at him thaim on the kingis behalf to ger' the bailyeis content and pay hyme half last
of salmunde as thai ar' oblist to hyme be thair' awin act' et quod dictus and at the saide aldirman
furthwith' chargit the bailyeis to content him and that thai sulde nocht pass' out of the
tolbuth' quhill he war' content and apon' this the saide Dauid askyt at me Robert gillespy
publik notar' ane Instrument

The samyn day mariory branche the spous' of Willam lutar' comperit befor the aldirman
in Jugement and ratyfijt and approwit the act' made be the saide Willam hir' husbande /
to Johne' the Waus' Junior' in the concernyng and keping of the saide John scathlace of the borowgang
drawin be him to Dauid meignes for the quhilk borowgang the saide John was distrenyeit
and for the outtrede of the borowgang and for payment to the saide Dauid of twelf pundis
of the vsuale monee of scotlande we aldirman and bailyeis eftir the tenour' of the saide act'
with' hale consent of the saide mariory has deliueryt and possessit the saide Dauid in a
lande of thairis lyande in futy with the pertinens et cetera and the half nettis fisching of
the pot watir that the saide Willam hade in tak of the gud toune' and the said' lande
and watir to ramayn with' the saide Dauid with al profitis on to the tym that he or his
deputis be fullely content and payit togiddir and at anys vpon' a day betuix the
son' rysing' and gangin to of that ilke of the forsaide twelf pundis lelyly and
trewly but fraude or gile the saide Dauid payande the male of the saide watir to the
bailyeis for sa lang as he has it in intromettyng /

Ranalde mor' sworne' has deponit be his athe that scottis Downy swor' and grauntyt in presens
of him that he brocht and left with a woman callit mirys' in abirdene thir' gudis vndirwrittyn that is to say a
fustian dublat a par of schetis of hussy mak a curche ij stomakis of Inglis clath' iij colaris
maid with nicoll clubis wyff a curche in wed' of vj d' Item ij sarkis of hussy mak with
the saide mirys' and was causar' of all his mysdedis

Introitus nauis andree lyseman magistrj et Wout Janson' mercator ijC quheit ijC salt /
a last sape /
The saide maystir and merchande has saulde to the aldirman in name of the gude toune' the jC quheit
for x s' the boll' Item the jC salt for x li' g' fyfty schillingis for the punde g' to be payit within
xv dayis eftir that the quheit and sall' be deliueryt to the gud toune' /

Tercio die mensis octobris anno Domini et cetera lxxno comparuit coram balliuis pro tribunali sedentibus Johannes
andirson' iunior et palam fatebatur se debere gilberto de Kintor duas barellas salmonum mensure ham
burgensis quare dicti balliui precipiebant seriandis quod dictus Johannes remaneat in pretorio quousque
Inueniat securos plegios ad satisfaciendum dicto gilberto dictas duas barellas salmonum infra
terminum Juris

Philp of Drumbrek seriando thome litstar of the grene Johne' casskin and Johne'
of tulydeff prisaris of four' brissin pottis and a litil lawar' prisit for xxix s vj d'

Curia capitalis burgi de Abberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem proxima post festum beati Michaeli
archangeli videlicet primo die mensis octobris Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo septuagesimo Quo die
sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent inferius

Eodem die Andreas alanson' electus fuit in offcium prepositure huius burgi pro anno sequente
qui prestitit Juramentum solitum pro iusticia facienda

Eodem die eciam patricius badenache Alexander blindsele thomas de camera et Johannes
Waus' Junior electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum huius burgi pro anno sequente qui prestiterunt
et eorum alter prestitit Juramentum ad fidelem execucionem dicti officij iuxta ipsorum posse

Eciam electi fuerunt in officium seriandorum pro anno sequente philippus de Drumbrek Johannes
Waus' Dauid farchar' et Duncanus de straloch' qui prestiterunt Juramentum solitum

Quo die frater Willelmus cumyn procurator et procuratorio nomine domus fratrum predicatorum
huius burgi accessit ad barram et protestabatur pro quodam annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo
denariorum debito annuatim priori et conuentui dicti domus de terra quondam Roberti boyde Jacente in
vico inferiori ecclesie et cetera ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo Redditu
preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia coram balliuis in sacculo tanquam tercio die huius
processus coram hiis testibus Johanne crukschank Donaldo de strathachin Andrea mair'
et Dauid farchar' seriando et cetera

Eodem die Johannes moyses sepe vocatus ad sectam Alexander blindsele ut supra non comparuit tanquam tercio
die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera

Marioria branch super quam andreas adamson' porrexit plegium pro iniusta detencione ut supra
sepe vocatus ad sectam dicti andree non comparuit tanquam secundo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera

Willelmus smitht super quem Johannes de Kintor porrexit plegium pro iniusta p detencione ab eodem
de duabus barellis salmonum mensure hamburgensis sepe vocatus ad sectam ipsius non comparuit tanquam primo
huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando quod capiat districtum a Ricardo de Kinto plegio suo ad intrandum
ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundo die huius processus

Quinto die mensis octobris anno Domini quo supra Robertus de culan electus fuit in officium
decani gilde pro anno sequente qui prestitit Juramentum solitum
